mapper.insert: insert into secretary_board (board_id, board_category1, board_category2, board_title, board_content, user_id, board_ispublic) values (secretary_board_seq.nextval, #{boardCategory1}, #{boardCategory2}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{userId}, #{boardIsPublic})
mapper.select: select answer_content, user_id, to_char(answer_date, '[yyyy.mm.dd] hh24:mm:ss') answer_date from secretary_answer where board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO secretary_answer (answer_content, user_id, answer_date) VALUES (#{answerContent}, #{userId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: update secretary_board set board_hits = board_hits + 1 where board_id = #{boardId}
update secretary_board set board_status = 1 where board_id = #{boardId}
